title: Bug 2373[About] no intuitive way to know the workbench location (1GEUSX8)
description: Bug 2373[About] no intuitive way to know the workbench location (1GEUSX8) AK (6/5/01 5:22:26 PM)there's no good way to figure out where the workbench is located.the workaround i use is: start the new java project and look at the location there.it is very annoying that this feature is missing.NOTES:EG (6/5/2001 5:32:51 AM)moving to ITPUI
